cmp: 门 (opening/door/gate/doorway/gateway/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy))
mng: bored, depressed, melancholy, sealed, airtight, tightly closed
stuffy, shut indoors, to smother, to cover tightly

exm.mng: sultry, sultriness, hot and stuffy, stifling hot
oppressive (of weather), heavy, depressed, not happy, (of sound) dull, muffled
to relieve boredom or melancholy, a diversion
to feel oppressed, to be depressed, to feel dejected
